title: Project Naradha
short_description: My Home Lab project, self-hosted a few services, customized my LAN, my VPS as reverse proxy for exposing it to the Public Internet, continuing to experiment and improve it.

title: Sujnana
short_description: This is my Personal Blog-site, build with just Vanilla JS, HTML and CSS. Currently just static but planning to make it dynamic once I have enough budget.

title: Detection of Epilepsy and SOS Reporting
short_description: Won Rs. 20k in FAER Scholar Awards 2024-25(FAER is a Indian Non-Profit organization). Signed an NDA, can't say more.

title: linux-file-org
short_description: File organizer for linux built using Rust. Organizes files into directories based on their file types.

title: emcequ
short_description: A simple MCQ Test web-app that can be hosted on any modern machine in the local network. I built this for the first round of my college Dept. Fest Technotsava's Debugging challenge.

title: glscripts
short_description: Bash scripts that I write for maintaining my Arch Linux(primarily) system.

title: Chat Gurudev
short_description: Simple web-app to interact with LLMs deployed with Ollama on the local network. Initially I intended to deploy this on my college server.

title: This Website
short_description: Personal Website I made using React and Tailwind. Static website no dynamic elements yet, because I am currently hosting it on GitHub Pages

title: fras (Failed Project)
short_description: Facial Recognition and Automation system, I had very little understanding of how real software is built when I started this so this didn't work out.
